sentence: The price was just okay and so was the wine
The hotel was very nice but not worth the cost
Which is why I rated this resort in name only as it is ok
The food was really great drinks are not included in the brunch price and the wait staff was really attentive
Chateau wines were excellent and very reasonably priced
Overall the stay was nice and relaxing but I am hesitant to staying here again after paying so much and experiencing what I did
The overall experience was excellent and a bit pricey
Our weekend package also included two breakfast buffets that cost 40 each morning
The food was good but I will say it is a little pricey for the quality other than that it was a great experience and will definately be going back
We did not like the view from our suite they immediately upgraded us to another suite with no extra charge very friendly staff
The prices are too inflated for a resort in the middle of nowhere Georgia
Not only fo they book up quickly during these times but the few remaining rooms they will have left as the holiday approaches get quite a bit more pricey
I was there for my girlfriend bridal shower brunch in the restaurant it is so over rated not enough food selection
Also we got charged 28 for a movie we did not rent and 100 extra charge to my card that still has not been refunded 4 days later
unacceptable for what we paid for the weekend
By this I mean that there were not enough staff to acomodate the visitors and there were cost add ons where the tour was no longer included in the wine tasting
Our expectations were high because for the facility however the price was too much the Buffet was too expensive and the food was simply ok
Paying the hefty price for a spa service includes the amenities at the spa
So disapointing considering the multi million dollar renovation
No where to get snacks or water without paying exhorbitant prices
